lead_paragraph: Jurgen Klinsmann, coach of the men’s national soccer team, released his training camp roster ahead of a March 5 friendly with Ukraine in Cyprus.
snippet: Jurgen Klinsmann, coach of the men’s national soccer team, released his training camp roster ahead of a March 5 friendly with Ukraine in Cyprus.
